Review_Text: Since the basic knowledge of Holocaust it was always the thought that nazi could not do this alone ... and this documentary is just a confirmation of the long standing thought of mine ... hard topic even after so many years ... can wrap around this how can this be part of our history ... overall it is good documentary... hope to see something more from the creator of this documentary, but still question is not answered why this started and how people was willing to participate in these horrific killings when so many innocent victims die ... hope in the future there will be more answers and the history will not be repeated.
